Name: Li Jin
Who: If there is such a thing as an It Girl in venture capital these days, Ms. Jin, 31, would fill the bill. She sits at the intersection of start-up investing and the fast-growing ecosystem of online creators, both of which are red hot. And while she formed her own venture firm, https://www.atelierventures.co/, just last year and has raised a relatively small $13 million for a fund, Ms. Jin was among the first investors in Silicon Valley to take influencers seriously and has written about and backed creators for years.

Name: Yanis Varoufakis
Who: Ioannis "Yanis" Varoufakis is a Greek economist and politician. A former academic, he served as the Greek Minister of Finance from January to July 2015 under Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras. He has been Secretary-General of MeRA25, a left-wing political party, since he founded it in 2018.

Name: John Vervaeke
Who: John Vervaeke is a professor of cognitive science at the University of Toronto, who has published a 50-part lecture series on Youtube, called "Awakening from the Meaning Crisis." These quite challenging one-hour lectures attracted up to 150,000 viewers worldwide.

Name: Simona Pop
Who: DAO Engagement strategy at Gitcoin, Community status at ethstatus, art collector, and content curator

Name: Griff Green
Who: Co-Founder at Giveth, Commons Stack & DAppNode

Name: Eirini Malliaraki
Who: “I’m a London based designer, researcher, and entrepreneur. I’m interested in the boundary-muddlings of information, computation, minds and nature.”

Name: Naveen Jain
